entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Allow for a way to ensure some source generators run before / after others #57239
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "semi-auto-properties" #57012
    Backlog
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (IEnumerable<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71296
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74642
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Narrow EA dependency #74640
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use auto properties #74637
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • WIP #74638
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Include App.config item only for net472 builds #74639
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update 'use auto property' to support using the `field` keyword #74629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
